word.description: The left [radical](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Radical_(Chinese_characters)) {氵} is *water*, indicating this is liquid, and the right [radical](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Radical_(Chinese_characters)) {由} indicates the sound.

images.place: Tim Ho Wan, Las Vegas, Nevada

description: {油}, like it's English translation *oil*, refers to petroleum and plant oils like sesame oil, but also denotes the more liquid sauces such as soy sauce and chili oil, and even butter.
